akn:section.akn:heading: Buildings not to be draped in mourning

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 3105. Buildings not to be draped in mourning No building owned, or used for public purposes, by the Federal Government shall be draped in mourning nor may public money be used for that purpose. (Pub. L. 107–217, Aug. 21, 2002, 116 Stat. 1143.)
